# lap

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `lap` is to demonstrate the `leprechaun` framework.

## Installation

You can install the development version of lap from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github(repo = "mjfrigaard/sap", ref = "24_leprechaun")
```

## App

Run the app using:

```{r}
#| eval: false
library(lap)
run()
```
